name: Happy Doggie - Find the Dog's Hidden Objects
name_original: Happy Doggie - Find the Dog's Hidden Objects
description:
Woof, woof, woof!
Give me what I want and I will be a happy doggie.

In Happy Doggie, various items that doggie wants are hidden in the unknown corners of the rooms. Bring your wits into full play to solve puzzles, find the items out and beat 24 challenging missions.

Woof, woof, woof. Hurry up, man!

FEATURES
√ PLAY with ease and fun
√ ENJOY the cute graphics
√ SOLVE puzzles with wits
√ BEAT 24 challenging missions
√ WATCH video walkthroughs for free

Like Hi Studio Games on Facebook!

http://www.facebook.com/HiStudioGames
